name: burgeon-adaire
description: PT. Burgeon Adaire International thrives in a dynamic landscape, offering insights and opportunities while building strong partnerships and consistently delivering exceptional value.

scripts.s3: aws s3 rm s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 rm s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compressed --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/compiled s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/compiled s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compiled --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/assets/images s3://burgeonadaire-storage --recursive && aws s3 cp ./dist/assets/videos s3://burgeonadaire-storage/videos --recursive && aws s3 cp ./compressed s3://burgeonadaire-storage/compressed --recursive

author: PT. Burgeon Adaire International
